thread.section_title: MicksGarage.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MicksGarage.com | www.micksgarage.com
thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text:
There can be various experiences, good and bad, when ordering goods over the internet, and Mick's Garage is, in my opinion, one of the good ones. Indeed, good is not enough --- I would say brilliant! I was kept up to date at every stage, and even the item you could not supply merited a very friendly reply and explanation from John Galvin. The lens for an indicator light supplied was the correct model, very reasonably priced, and well packed so that it arrived in undamaged condition. Many thanks to Louise and to John Galvin for an enjoyable buying experience.
Kind regards - John Oldham ( edward@ Manx.net )
